Package Cmp3\Composer

Cross Media Publishing - CMP3 www.cross-media.net

Interface summary

ComposerInterface Interface of composers

Class summary

PdfGhostscript Composer which processes pdf files using ghostscript
ComposerAbstract Base class of composers
PdfOverlay Composer which overlays pdf files.
Dummy Dummy - just makes a log entry
PdfBox Composer which set bounding boxes of pdf files
ComposerProcessing Performs content processing using one or more Composers
PdfImpose Composer which imposes pages of pdf files
Exception Composer exception
PdfShrink Composer which shrink pdf files
PdfIntentionallyBlankPages Composer which inserts pdf files in the result array to fit an imposition
PdfMerge Composer which merges pdf files
PdfPageCount Composer which doesn't do any manipulation but count pages only.
